abstract: The boutique investment bank found a muted reception from investors on Thursday; shares in the firm were down about 13 percent in the early afternoon.
snippet: The boutique investment bank found a muted reception from investors on Thursday; shares in the firm were down about 13 percent in the early afternoon.
lead_paragraph: The boutique investment bank PJT Partners found a muted reception from investors on its first day as a publicly traded company.

headline.main: Shares of PJT Partners Decline on Debut

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
